pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.25: _Sabbamidaṁ carimaṁ katan_. [Sp-ṭ.3.1.647](): _yaṁ amhehi tīhi janehi kataṁ, sabbamidaṁ kiccaṁ lāmakaṁ nimmariyādaṁ adhammikaṁ_, “What the three of us have done is all low, outside of acceptable bounds, and unrighteous.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.27.1: The attribution of speakers is according to [Sp.2.647]().
